diagram:
@startuml
actor Patient as "Patient"
boundary HospitalPortal as "Hospital Portal"
control AdmissionService as "Admission Service"
control PatientService as "Patient Service"
database PatientDB as "Patient Database"
database MedicalRecordDB as "Medical Record Database"
Patient ->> HospitalPortal: Request Admission
HospitalPortal ->> AdmissionService: Process Admission
AdmissionService ->> PatientService: Retrieve Patient Info
PatientService ->> PatientDB: Query Patient Data
PatientDB --> PatientService: Return Patient Data
PatientService --> AdmissionService: Patient Info
AdmissionService ->> MedicalRecordDB: Retrieve Medical Records
MedicalRecordDB --> AdmissionService: Return Medical Records
AdmissionService ->> AdmissionService: Validate Insurance
note over AdmissionService: Check patient's insurance coverage
alt Insurance Valid
    AdmissionService ->> AdmissionService: Confirm Admission
    note over AdmissionService: Update patient status
    AdmissionService --> HospitalPortal: Admission Confirmed
    HospitalPortal --> Patient: Admission Details
else Insurance Invalid
    AdmissionService --> HospitalPortal: Admission Denied
    HospitalPortal --> Patient: Insurance Error
end
@enduml
